Temporary: How to build the module until the library binaries are in the repository

1) checkout the html parser from https://whattf.svn.cvsdude.com/htmlparser
2) apply the htmlparser-1.2.1.diff
3) build the html parser library
4) copy the generated jar file into the ${nbhome}/html.parser/external/htmlparser-1.2.1.jar
5) build the html.parser module itself
